tagline_connect_everywhere: Stay connected on every adventure — wherever the road takes you.
value_reliability: Trusted by explorers and innovators alike for reliable performance since {{year}}.
value_integration: Seamlessly connects with your favorite tools like {{toolList}} to power your journey.
value_scalability: Engineered to grow with your ambitions — from {{startSize}} to {{endSize}} teammates and beyond.
value_security: Built with enterprise-grade protection to safeguard your data across {{region}}.
value_flexibility: Drive your way — with flexible, intuitive systems designed for every {{role}}.
promo_free_trial: Start your Rivian experience today, {{name}}, and see what’s possible.
promo_innovation: Driving the future forward with innovative, sustainable technology by {{brand}}.
notification_new_message: {count, plural, =0 {You have no new messages.} one {You have {{count}} new message.} other {You have {{count}} new messages.}}
team_member_added: {count, plural, one {{{count}} new team member, {{memberName}}, joined your workspace.} other {{{count}} new team members joined your workspace.}}
